Package gw.api.assignment

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Assignee
    Something to which an assignable entity can be assigned. Often just a user/group pair but could also be something more abstract like "automatic assignment" or "assign to previous owner". An Assignee knows how to assign an assignable bean and should also implements the toString() method which will be used to display it to the user
    AssigneePicker
    Support for assignee picker, used to pick a user, group or queue to which a bean is going to be assigned. This object is used as a helper for PCF pages, to store an assignee picked from the resuls of an assignment search. If the current location has a "picker listener" set then setting the selected assignee will pick and pop the current location - that is it will pop the location and call the picker listener with the selected assignee. This is how the picker is usually used, both by the assignee picker window, which is used to pick another assignee value to add to a range input, and by the assignment popup which uses an assignee picker object if the user ignores the suggested assignee list and does an search instead.
    AssignmentEngineUtil
    A utility class for all assignment engine related funcitons.
    AssignmentPopup
    Support for assignment popup screen, used to assign a list of assignables to a user, group, queue or other assignee (for example, auto assignment). This screen makes use of an internal AssigneePicker to keep track of the assignment search results, which could be a user, group or queue.
    AssignmentSearchCriteria
    Encapsulates the search criteria used to search for an assignee, such as a user, group or queue.
    AssignmentSearchResult
    Actually performs a search based on an AssignmentSearchCriteria object. The criteria will specify a type of assignee to search for - "User", "Group" or "Queue". AssignmentSearchResult has methods to retrieve results of each of these types, but it will only return actual results for the type of assignee selected by the criteria. For example, if the criteria specify a "User" search then the methods for returning groups and queues will return empty query processors, while the method for returning users will return a real query processor that may return users (assuming any match the criteria). This captures the information needed to handle the result operations at creation time, and presents the result as a query processor of beans and the previous individual accessors.
    AssignmentType  
    AutoAssignAssignee
    Assignee used to auto assign an assignable bean, that is to assign it using the assignment rules appropriate for the type of bean (activity assignment rules for activities and so on). Implements the standard Assignee interface.
    DefaultAssignmentType<T extends Bean>  
    DynamicAssignmentStrategy  
    DynamicAssignmentUtil
    Utility class providing methods to help with DynamicAssignmentStrategy implementations
    DynamicGroupAssignmentStrategy  
    DynamicUserAssignmentStrategy  
    PublicAssignableQueueFinder
    Utility with a set of finders for assignable queues.
    SuggestedAssigneeBuilder  
    SuggestedAssigneeBuilderBase  
    UserAssignee
    Used to assign an assignable bean to a particular user in a particular group. Both user and group must be specified. This assignee is implemented as a separate call, rather than just having the GroupUser entity implement Assignee, because it makes it easy to construct an assignee in cases where we don't have easy access to a GroupUser entity. A user assignee can be given a custom display key to display the combination of the group and user display names. The display key will be given the user display name as its first parameter and the groiup display name as its second parameter. The display key does not affect the equality or hash code of the assignee, just its toString method.
    UserRoleOwner
    Interface for entities which have a UserRole array for "secondary" assignments.
